select id,tenantAccount as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,dbAccount as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t where phoneNo= #{phoneNo}

select id,tenantAccount as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,dbAccount as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t where tenantAccount= #{tenantAccount} and tenantPassword = #{tenantPassword}
select id,tenantAccount as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,dbAccount as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QDTenantInfo ( tenantAccount, tenantPassword, serverIp, serverPort, dbName, dbAccount, dbPassword, companyName, phoneNo, status, created, updated) VALUES ( #{tenantAccount}, #{tenantPassword}, #{serverIp}, #{serverPort}, #{dbName}, #{dbAccount}, #{dbPassword}, #{companyName}, #{phoneNo}, #{status}, #{created}, #{updated} )
